reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major arrhythmia types: atrial fibrillation (prevalence ~2200 per 100k, incidence ~100-200), ventricular tachycardia (500-800), supraventricular tachycardia (1000-1200), premature contractions (500-700), bradycardia (400-600), other arrhythmias (500+).
